job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongIts an exciting time to be at Infoblox Named a Top 25 Cyber Security Company by The Software Report and one of emIncem magazines Best Workplaces for 2020 we are leading the way to nextlevel DDI with our Secure CloudManaged Network Services bringing nextlevel security reliability and automation to cloud and hybrid systemsall managed through a single pane of glass Our success depends on bright energetic talented people who share a passion for building the next generation of networking technologiesand having fun along the waybrbrWe are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Cloud Engineering team in Tacoma WA or Austin TX reporting to the senior manager of Software Engineering In this role you will be a part of the team building SaaSbased applications and services powering Infobloxs Data Lake and other NextGen Platform components As part of the Cloud Engineering team you will have the opportunity to use the latest technology to deliver the core foundation for all Infoblox applications You will also get the opportunity to work with the best of the technical and thought leadership team at InfobloxbrbrYoure the ideal candidate if you are a strategic thinker who is driven to collaborate across teams operate independently and is deadline and resultsdrivenbrbrstronguWhat Youll DobrustrongulliJoin an agile SaaS team to design develop and maintain features and iteratively deploy services using Infobloxs cloudbased architectureliliDesign and implement components of the Next Generation Platform amp Data LakeliliRecommend ways to improve system reliability efficiency and qualityliliWork closely with various crossfunctional product teamsliliStay current on key trends especially in the area of technologies and frameworks like Kubernetes Docker and ELKPrometheusliliBe responsible for key backend components of the platformliliDevelop REST and gRPC APIs as well as contribute to the overall API frameworkbrbrliulstronguWhat Youll Bringbrustrongulli6 years of experience in software development with programming languages such as Python Golang or JavaliliIndepth knowledge of Linux system internals including boot network and storage subsystemsliliKnowledge of protocols such as DHCP DNS NTP and TCPIPliliGood understanding of microservices architecture and containerbased softwareliliExperience in microservices development and containerbased software using Docker and other container technologies is a huge plusliliExperience with Amazon Web Services EC2 VPC ELB S3 CloudFormation etc is a plusliliGood exposure in application performance tuning memory management and scalabilityliliAbility to design highly scalable distributed systems using different opensource technologiesliliExperience building highperformance algorithmsliliBachelors degree in CS CE or EE is required and masters in CS CE or EE is preferredliliGood communication skills brbrliulstronguWhat Success Looks LikebrbrustrongAfter six months you willbrulliDevelop expertise in GoLangPythonliliLearn new skills related to cloud technologiesliliDevelop expertise in a microservices architectureliliImprove efficiency rate with completing projectsbrbrliulstronguAfter About a Year You WillbrustrongulliHave made a significant contribution toward backend developmentliliHave made a significant contribution toward design and new ideasliliStart leading and taking ownership of the featureprojectliliHave gained handson working experience and become an expert on Docker and KubernetesbrbrliulstronguWeve Got You CoveredbrbrustrongOur holistic strongbenefitsstrong package includes coverage of your health wealth and wellnessas well as a great work environment employee programs and company culture We offer a competitive salary and benefits package including a 401k with a company match and generous paid time off to help you balance your life We have a strong culture and live our strongvaluesstrong every daywe believe in transparency curiosity respect and above all having fun while delighting our customersbrbrSpeaking of a great work environment here are just a few of the perks you may enjoy depending on your locationbrulliOnsite massages clubs farmers market and fitness classesliliDelicious and healthy snacks and beveragesliliElectric vehicle charging stationsliliOutdoor amenities seating and courtyard BBQliliDog park and petfriendly programsliliNewly remodeled offices with stateoftheart amenitiesbrbrliulstrong Why Infoblox brbrstrongWeve created a culture that embraces strongdiversity equity and inclusionstrong and rewards innovation curiosity and creativity We achieve remarkable results by working together in a supportive environment that focuses on continuous learning and embraces change So whether youre a software engineer marketing manager customer care pro or product specialist you belong here where you will have the opportunity to grow and develop your career Check out strongwhat its like to be a Bloxerstrong We think youll be excited to join our teambrbr
